amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration's pipeline safety program by $27,604,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding in the Pipeline Safety Oil Spill Liability Trust Fund by $27,604,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 222 (Roll no. 305).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 222 (Roll no. 305).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mrs. Capps.
